channel.title: Help!
channel.description: i need help plz how do i do corodnets so i can place monsters in there regular place? why cant i interact with npcs on my server?i mean it wont let me talk to any1 some1 plz help me

item.title: Help!
item.dc:creator: @pker_franc0 pker franc0
item.description:
@pker_franc0 wrote:

to find coordinates stand on the place u want ur monster to appear and type ::mypos and use the X and Y Coords u get on autospawn.cfg
ex:spawn = [npcid [XCor] [YCor] 0 0 0 0 0 1

Read full topic
